body:
Hello everyone!

Today we are rolling out a new feature that will allow teams to track overall statistics for all of their members.

Each team page now has a "Team Statistics" tab which will display the combined stats of the team's member,
Example: https://avicus.net/teams/24#statsTab

Hope you enjoy!
ALM
body_tagged:

title: Introducing Team Based Statistics!
